titleInfo.title: Selections from Eddy Arnold's Folk Song Book album - 1963-10-08

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Performances of Jeff Canady, The Song Of The Coo Coo, Gotta Travel On, and Time's A-Getting Hard from Eddy Arnold's album, Folk Song Book. Performers include Eddy Arnold (vocals), Chet Atkins (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Jerry Kennedy (guitar), Henry Strzelecki (bass), Harold Bradley (drums), Layne (vibes), and the Needmore Creek Singers (background vocals). Produced by Chet Atkins, engineered by Bill Porter, and recorded on October 8, 1963 at RCA Victor Studio in Nashville, Tenn.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
